K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-001:1b-1: a'arya brahma pa ri pritstsh'a n'a ma ma h'a y'a na s'u tra /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-001:1b-3: 'phags pa tshangs pas zhus pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-001:1b-5: byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-001:1b-6: 'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-001:2a-0: bcom ldan 'das grong khyer yangs pa na tshal chen po'i khang pa brtsegs @2a #//
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-001:2a-1: pa'i gnas na dge slong khri nyis stong gi dge 'dun chen po dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-001:2a-2: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rab tu mang po dang thabs gcig tu bzhugs te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-001:2a-3: de nas bcom ldan 'das mi nyal tsam gyi nam gyi gung thun la skyil mo krung bcas nas dran pa mngon du bzhag ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-001:2a-5: dpyod pa dang bcas pa'i ting nge 'dzin las skyes pa'i dga' ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-001:2b-0: bde ba can bsam gtan dang po la snyoms @2b par zhugs so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-001:2b-1: bcom ldan 'das de las bzhengs nas rtog pa med pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-001:2b-2: dpyod pa med pa'i ting nge 'dzin las skyes pa'i dga' ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-001:2b-3: bde ba can bsam gtan gnyis pa la snyoms par zhugs so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-001:2b-4: bcom ldan 'das de las bzhengs nas dga' ba'i 'dod chags dang bral ba /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-001:2b-5: btang snyoms pa dran pa dang ldan pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-001:2b-6: bde par gnas pa bsam gtan gsum pa la snyoms par zhugs so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-001:2b-7: bcom ldan 'das de las bzhengs nas bde ba'ang spangs te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-001:2b-8: snga nas sdug bsngal yang spangs shing yid bde ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-001:2b-9: yid mi bde ba'ang nub pas phyir sdug bsngal yang med /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-001:2b-11: btang snyoms dang dran pa yongs su dag pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-001:2b-12: bsam gtan bzhi pa la snyoms par zhugs so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-001:3a-0: de nas bcom ldan 'das bsam gtan bzhi pa las bzhengs nas bsam gtan gsum pa la @3a *//
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-001:3a-2: bsam gtan gsum pa las bzhengs nas bsam gtan gnyis pa la zhugs so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-001:3a-3: bsam gtan gnyis pa las bzhengs nas bsam gtan dang po la zhugs so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-001:3a-4: bsam gtan dang po las bzhengs nas gdul bya ji lta ba bzhin du sems can la gzugs kyi lus kun tu ston pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyams par zhugs so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-001:3a-5: bcom ldan 'das gdul bya ji lta ba bzhin du sems can la gzugs kyi lus kun tu ston pa'i ting nge 'dzin de la snyoms par zhugs ma thag tu de nas skad cig de la bcom ldan 'das shin tu lham me lham ne lhang nger bzhugs te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-001:3a-6: mi mjed kyi bdag po tshangs pa tshangs pa'i gnas na 'dug bzhin du bcom ldan 'das shin tu lham me lhan ne lhang nge ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-001:3a-7: skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis kyis legs par brgyan pa mthong ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-001:3b-0: mthong nas kyang tshangs pa'i @3b 'jig rten nas mi snang bar gyur nas thams cad dang ldan pa'i tshal chen po 'od kyis snang bar byed te bcom ldan 'das kyis spyan sngar ha cang yang mi ring bzhig tu 'dug go /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-001:3b-1: de nas mi mjed kyi bdag po tshangs pas 'di snyam du bsams te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-001:3b-2: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni bsnyen par dka' ba rnam par shes pa dka' ba yin na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-001:3b-3: bcom ldan 'das ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs pa la bdag gis lud pa bsal ba'i sgra'am /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-001:3b-4: smra ba tsam gyis bzhengs par gsol ba ni bdag gi cha ma yin gyi /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-001:3b-5: bdag gis tshigs su bcad pa dag gis bcom ldan 'das bzhengs par gsol gor ma chag snyam ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-001:3b-6: de nas mi mjed kyi bdag po tshangs pas bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas 'dug bzhin du bcom ldan 'das ga la pa der logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud de mgo btud nas /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-001:3b-7: bcom ldan 'das la tshigs su bcad pa dag gis bzhengs par gsol to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-001:3b-8: ma gos dri ma ma mchis rnam par dag /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-001:3b-9: lha dang mi mchog rnams dang dri za dang //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-001:3b-11: lha min rnams kyis legs mchod pa //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-001:3b-12: sems can sman slad mgon po khyod la mchod //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-001:3b-13: dper na ri ni rab tu mi g-yos dang //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-001:3b-14: ji ltar rgya mtsho gting ni mi dpogs ltar //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-001:3b-15: bdud rnams thams cad kyis kyang mi g-yos la //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-001:3b-16: thub pa skyes bu mchog ni bsam gtan mdzad //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-001:4a-1: mnga' mtshan ma mi mnga' zhing //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-001:4a-2: tha dad mi mnga' brtan pa mi mnga' la //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-001:4a-3: gnas mi mnga' zhing snang ba mi mnga' ba'i //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-001:4a-4: thub pa skyes bu dam pa bsam gtan mdzad //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-001:4a-5: rtog ge rnams kyi yul ni ma lags shing //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-001:4a-6: byis pa rnams kyi spyod yul ma lags pa //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-001:4a-7: sems dang sems las byung bas rab 'das pa //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-001:4a-8: bsam gtan pha rol gshegs pa bsam gtan mdzad //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-001:4a-9: mgon po seng ge bzhin du gsung yang sgrog /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-001:4a-10: thub pa 'brug bzhin sgrog pa rab tu mdzad //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-001:4a-11: dpa' bo zla ba bzhin du rab tu mdzes //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-001:4a-12: sems can dkon mchog khyod la phyag 'tshal lo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-001:4a-13: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis mi mjed kyi bdag po tshangs pas bskul ba'i tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gis bskul bar thugs su chud nas ji ltar skyil mo krung bcas pa de nyid kyi ting nge 'dzin de las bzhengs so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-001:4a-14: bzhengs nas bcom ldan 'das kyis mi mjed kyi bdag po tshangs pa la spran pa'i phyir mgur bsal ba'i sgra mdzad pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-001:4a-15: mi mjed kyi bdag po tshangs pas bcom ldan 'das ting nge 'dzin de las bzhengs te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-001:4a-16: ji ltar skyil mo krung bcas pa de nyid kyis bzhugs pa mthong ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-001:4a-17: mthong nas kyang bcom ldan 'das ga ba ba der song ste phyin nas /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-001:4a-18: bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byas te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-001:4b-0: bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs @4b la mgo bos phyag btsal nas phyogs gcig tu 'dug go /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-001:4b-1: phyogs gcig tu 'dug nas mi mjed kyi bdag po tshangs pas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-001:4b-2: gal te zhus nas zhu ba lung bstan pa'i slad du /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-001:4b-3: bcom ldan 'das kyis bdag la skabs dbye bar gnang na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas la bdag phyogs 'ga' zhig zhu lags so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-001:4b-4: de skad ces gsol pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-001:4b-5: bcom ldan 'das kyis mi mjed kyi bdag po tshangs pa la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-001:4b-7: zhu ba lung bstan pa'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pas rtag tu khyod la skabs phye yi /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-001:4b-9: khyod ci dang ci 'dod pa de bzhin gshegs pa la zhus shig dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-001:4b-10: zhus pa de dang de nyid kyi lung bstan pas ngas khyod kyi sems rangs par bya'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-001:4b-11: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis skabs phye bas mi mjed kyi bdag po tshangs pas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-001:4b-13: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dag chos du dang ldan na mya ngan du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba lags /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-001:4b-14: de skad ces gsol pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-001:4b-15: bcom ldan 'das kyis mi mjed kyi bdag po tshangs pa la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-001:5a-1: sems dpa' chen po dag chos gcig dang ldan na myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-001:5a-4: lus kyi rjes su song ba'i dran pa'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-001:5a-6: byang chub sems dpa' lus kyi rjes su song ba'i dran pa ci lta bu yin zhe na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-001:5a-8: 'di la byang chub sems dpa' ni 'gro'o snyam pa'i dran pa dang ldan pa yin zhing yang dag par ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-001:5a-9: ldog go snyam du dran pa dang ldan pa yin zhing yang dag par ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-001:5a-13: 'dug go snyam du dran pa dang ldan pa yin zhing yang dag par ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-001:5a-14: de gcig pu dben par 'dug ste nang du yang dag bzhag nas 'khrug pa med pa'i yid kyi lus 'di nyid la /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-001:5a-16: kye ma lus 'di ni mi brtan pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-001:5a-18: rang bzhin gyis nyam chung ba /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-001:5a-25: zil pa'i thig pa dang 'dra ba /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-001:5b-0: nyi mas mthar thug @5b ba; mthar 'drul ba /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-001:5b-2: ngan skyugs kyi mthar thug pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-001:5b-10: 'dzag pa can bsgrims te rim gro byed dgos pa yin par yang dag pa'i dran pas yang dag par ji lta ba bzhin du so sor rtog go /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-001:5b-11: de de ltar yang dag pa'i dran pas lus kyi skyon rnams yang dag par ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes pas lus la chags pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-001:5b-12: lus la kun tu 'dod chags dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-001:5b-13: lus la bdag gi nyid yin pa mi bskyed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-001:5b-14: de lus la mi lta bas srog chags pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-001:5b-15: srog la kun tu 'dod chags dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-001:5b-16: srog la bdag gi nyid yin pa mi bskyed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-001:5b-17: de lus dang srog la mi lta bar chos gos ngan ngon dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-001:5b-22: yo byad ngan ngon tsam dag gis chog par 'dzin pa yin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-001:5b-23: de tshangs pa mtshungs par spyod pa rnams kyi bya ba gang dag yin pa don dang ldan pa rnams sam /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-001:5b-24: dge ba dang ldan pa rnams kyang de dag la stong bar byed de /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-001:5b-25: yongs su mi skyo zhing yongs su yid 'chad pa med la yongs su skyo ba'i sems mi bskyed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-001:5b-26: de mkhan po dang slob dpon gyi gan du 'gro na dran pa dang ldan zhing 'di snyam du sems te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-001:5b-27: mkhan po dag ni bsnyen par dka' ba /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-001:6a-2: bdag der song ba na sdig pa mi dge ba kun tu spyod pa 'ga' zhig gis bdag la glengs shing dran par byas na mi rung ngo snyam nas de rgyu dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-001:6a-4: gzhi des bslab pa rnams la gus pa byed par 'gyur te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-001:6a-6: legs par bya ba byed pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-001:6a-7: zhi ba rnal du byed pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-001:6a-8: shin tu yongs su mthar thug par byed pa can du 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-001:6a-9: de la bslab pa rnams la gus pa byed pa nyid dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-001:6a-10: brtun par byed pa nyid dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-001:6a-11: legs par bya ba byed pa nyid dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-001:6a-12: zhi ba rnal du byed pa nyid dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-001:6a-13: shin tu yongs su mthar thug par byed pa nyid kyis mkhan po dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-001:6a-14: slob dpon gyi gan du 'gro ba na bag tsha ba med pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-001:6a-15: bag 'khum pa med par 'gro zhing 'jigs pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-001:6a-16: lhan cig tu byung ba'i rgol pa'ang mi ston ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-001:6a-18: gus pa dang bcas shing zhes dang bcas pa yin la /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-001:6a-19: rigs kyi bag ma bzhin du 'dzem pa dang ldan pa'i phyir ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-001:6a-20: de la 'dzem pa dang ldan pas lus kyi skyon dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-001:6a-21: lus kyi nyes par spyod pa gang dag yin pa de dag thams cad kyis thams cad du yongs su spong ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-001:6a-23: byang chub sems dpa' lus kyi skyon dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-001:6a-24: lus kyi nyes par spyod pa de dag gang zhe na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-001:6a-26: srog gcod pa ni byang chub sems dpa'i lus kyi skyon dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-001:6a-27: lus kyi nyes par spyod pa yin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-001:6b-0: @6b ma byin pa len pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-001:6b-1: mi tshangs par spyod pa ni byang chub sems dpa'i lus kyi skyon dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-001:6b-2: lus kyi nyes par spyod pa yin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-001:6b-4: byang chub sems dpa' ci ltar na srog gcod pa spong ba yin zhe na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-001:6b-6: 'di la byang chub sems dpa' ni 'dod chags kyi dbang gis srog chags kyi srog gcod par mi byed /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-001:6b-8: gti mug gi dbang gis srog chags kyi srog gcod par mi byed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-001:6b-9: de sems can gzhan dag dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-001:6b-10: gang zag gzhan rnams la bdag tsam du 'du shes par byed cing sdug pa tsam du 'du shes par byed de /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-001:6b-11: bdag nyid kyi sems can gzhan dag dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-001:6b-12: gang zag gzhan rnams kyi srog gcod par mi byed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-001:6b-13: gzhan dag kyang srog gcod du mi 'jug go /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-001:6b-14: gzhan dag srog gcod pa la yang dag par rjes su yi rang bar mi byed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-001:6b-15: bdag gis kyang mi gcod do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-001:6b-16: gzhan dag kyang gcod mi 'jug go /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-001:6b-17: gzhan dag gcod pa la'ang rjes su yi rang bar mi byed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-001:6b-19: gzhan dag kyang rdeg du mi 'jug go /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-001:6b-20: gzhan dag rdeg par byed pa la'ang rjes su yid rang bar mi byed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-001:6b-21: ji ltar na ma byin pa len pa spong ba yin zhe na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-001:6b-22: tshangs pa; 'di la byang chub sems dpa' ni sems can rnams kyi 'tsho ba'i yo byad gang dag yin pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-001:7a-6: rgyan gyi rnam pa dag dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-001:7a-10: bde ba'i rnam pa de dag la chags pa mi skyed /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-001:7a-11: de dag la rnam par rtog par mi byed cing rku 'phrog mi byed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-001:7a-13: rku 'phrog byed pa rnams la rjes su yi rang par mi byed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-001:7a-15: dgon pa na yod pa ma byin zhing ma gnang ba rtsva'i 'dab ma tsam yang len par mi byed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-001:7a-16: ji ltar na mi tshangs par spyod pa spong ba yin zhe na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-001:7a-17: tshangs pa; 'di la byang chub sems dpa' dbang po rnams kyi sgo legs par bsrung shing gnas pa yin /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-001:7a-19: mthun pa'i gnas su rgyu ba yin /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-001:7a-20: shin tu bsrung ba'i dran pa dang ldan pa yin /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-001:7a-21: rtag tu bsrung ba'i dran pa dang ldan yin /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-001:7a-22: de dran pas yi kun tu srung ba yin /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-001:7a-24: ngag shin tu bsdams pa yin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-001:7a-25: mthun pa'i gnas su rgyu la dran pa dang ldan pa yin zhing 'di snyam du'ang sems bskyed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-001:7a-26: mi zhig gis bye ma zhing mo shin tu bsregs pa lag pa gnyis kyi snyim pas blangs te mig bkang ba ni sla'i /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-001:7a-27: chags pa'i sems kyis yul gyi bzang mo la lta ba ni lta ma yin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-001:7b-0: bdag yul gyi bzang po la bltas pas yun rung por phung @7b zhing bcom la ma rung bar gyur pa'i phyir ro snyam mo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-001:7b-1: de de ltar lus la lus kyi rjes su lta zhing bza' ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-001:7b-5: stan rnams la dran pa legs par gnas pa yin te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-001:7b-6: de dag la spyod pa na ro myang bar mi byed cing chags pa'i sems med pa yin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-001:7b-7: gal te de yongs su spyod pa na bde ba skye ba lta na des de la 'di ltar nye bar brtag par bya ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-001:7b-8: bde bar snang ba 'di ni bzlog pa'i sgo nas sdug bsngal yin te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-001:7b-9: khams gsum pa 'di na 'dus byas kyi dngos po bde ba gang yang med do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-001:7b-11: 'dus byas mi rtag pa'i phyir ro //

K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-001:7b-14: gal te byang chub sems dpa' yongs su spyod pa na sdug bsngal kho na skye ba'i bde ba ni ma yin te /
